document_data.name: Trulit & Greegon's Claret
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trulit & Greegon's claret''''' was a type of red [[wine]] that was traded in the city and through [[Daggerford]]'s docks.
document_data.History: ''Trulit & Greegon's claret'' was the favorite wine of [[Purfbin Doogrick]], a [[gnome]] companion of the [[Hero of Daggerford]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]]. During their quest to untangle many plots against the city of Daggerford, they came across numerous claret [[barrel]]s in the docks. The gnome recognized the alluring aroma instantaneously and regretted that they could not "acquire" some. These barrels were traded through the docks of Daggerford via Captain [[Samuel Turgat]]'s ''[[Flyingfish]]''.
